message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $160. This exceptional value includes not only the product itself but also exclusive access to our VIP support services. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-tier offerings.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the VIP support, but $160 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay at this time. Would you be open to $145?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $155? This still offers you the best value with our VIP support, while accommodating your financial considerations.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $155 is still a bit outside my budget. Let's try $150. That would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm sure I can still enjoy the benefits of your VIP support.
